trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la riga del pager in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the FormViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Viene creata un'istanza del FormViewPagerRow per contenere i controlli pager in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the FormViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>interfaccia Ã¨ un indicatore che indica che il controllo FormViewPagerRow fa parte di <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>gerarchia dei controlli dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene usata principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di controlli possono eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>costruttore e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>metodi del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>classe per creare una riga del pager personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The FormViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore FormViewPagerRow chiama il costruttore della classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, con i parametri specificati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the call is made `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>controllo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controllo, viene effettuata la chiamata `rowType` uguale a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>e `rowState` uguale a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
